review: I had heard this was the best streaming stick on the market when I made the purchase in December of 2014 and I bought into that hype. After receiving the "Roku 3500R Streaming Stick" it take long to test my patience as it kept dropping the Wi-Fi connection along with the dropping the activations to the likes of Netflix, Youtube, amazon prime and others. Oh I spoke with Roku customer support after a 1-1-/2 hr wait, they had no clear answer why it wasn't connecting to my wi-fi network other than reboot, reboot, reboot, oh it worked that time - goodbye. I should have returned the item early on but I was still hoping the hype was correct and the issue was me being a fossil and didn't know enough to make it work correctly. Well today something snapped in me as the hype was gone and the POS Roku says it got "excellent" but nothing would load. From my view this this Roku 3500R streaming Stick isn't even worth target practice. BUYER BEWARE ROKU SUPPORT IS AT LEAST 1 HR. OUT AND SKETCHY AT BEST.
